about_the_game:
PARANORMAL

Step into a world on the brink of collapse in Strange Horizons, a gripping survival-adventure game. When a dimensional portal tears open in the sky, chaos erupts as mysterious creatures spill into our world. As a civilian contractor working for the military, your mission is to enter the quarantine zone, recover critical data, save survivors, and uncover the secrets behind the disaster.

 

                                                      BASE BUILDING

Survive by building and upgrading your base to withstand the growing dangers. Gather resources and craft essential tools, weapons, and equipment to stay prepared. Explore a dangerous and atmospheric landscape filled with desolate buildings, eerie forests, and the looming energy vortex in the sky.

 

                                                            SURVIVAL

Face strange hybrid creatures, solve environmental puzzles, and make life-or-death decisions as you fight to close the portal before it's too late. Time is against you, and survival requires strategy, courage, and adaptability.

 

                                                        ADVENTURE

Featuring stunning cel shaded visuals, deep crafting mechanics, and an apocalyptic setting, Strange Horizons delivers an intense and immersive experience. Will you uncover the truth, or will the world succumb to the chaos of another dimension?

The unknown awaits in Strange Horizons.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit Operating System
  • Processor: CPU Ryzen 5 3600X, Core i5 11600K
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GPU GTX 1080; RTX 2060 SUPER; RX 5700 XT
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit Operating System
  • Processor: CPU Ryzen 7 5800X, i5-12600K
  • Memory: 32 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics RTX 3080; RTX 3070 (DLSS Balanced); RX 6800 XT
  • Storage: 20 GB available space

short_description: Strange Horizons is a survival-adventure game where a portal to another dimension unleashes chaos. Build your base, craft essential tools, explore the quarantined zone, face hybrid creatures, and uncover secrets to close the rift before it's too late.
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Russian, Spanish - Spain, Korean, Simplified Chinese, Swedish, Spanish - Latin America, Portuguese - Portugal
*languages with full audio support
